meta: Circles UBI | Basic Income on the Blockchain
slogan: A Basic Income on the Blockchain
main-paragraph-1: Circles is a new way to think about money. Circles is a people powered money system.
main-paragraph-2: Exchange with Circles happens upon agreement between two trusted parties about the price and the quantity provided.
about-subtitle: Circles is a basic income made to promote local economy within your community
about-widget-1-content: Anyone who joins Circles receives a basic income regularly, without conditions.
about-widget-2-content: The more connected your community is, the more valuable your Circles become.
about-widget-3-content: A worldwide basic income built bottom up, and issued without a central authority.
hiw-subtitle: Circles is the easiest way to recieve a basic income, unconditionally
community-subtitle: Drop in and meet other people interested in building their own economy
community-widget-1-content: Explore the Circles community to meet other folks building local economy together.
community-widget-2-content: Read the Circles Handbook to learn more about how Circles works.
community-widget-3-content: Join the open source community working to develop Circles on Github.
marketplace-content: You can also explore our peer-to-peer marketplace on Telegram
